content: The Snow Fox is a character you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth: Wukong. Completing her side quest will unlock a secret boss for you to take on and a unique Curio.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snow_Fox_Questline.md', within the main section titled 'Snow Fox Questline'.
The content is as follows:
The Snow Fox is a character you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth: Wukong. Completing her side quest will unlock a secret boss for you to take on and a unique Curio.
